entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
